ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have you thought about the water that you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Consider the water that you drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did you cast a good look at the water that you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have you seen the water which you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So what is your opinion regarding the water that you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do you not see the water that you drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have you considered the water which you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have you considered the water you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Have ye observed the water which ye drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you considered the water that you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Behold! - the water which ye drink:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have you considered the water that you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: See ye the water which ye drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Tell Me! The water that you drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you thought about the water you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have you seen the water you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And have you seen the water that you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:68]   Have you considered the water you drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Have ye) people of Mecca (observed the) pure (water which ye drink) irrigate your fields with and give to your cattle to drink?
